description:
Yurika is a fellow freshman at Higashi High. Though the daughter of a well-to-do family, Yurika has a spunky personality and is brimming with curiosity. She becomes acquainted with http://anidb.net/ch41399 [Kaoru] and the gang after http://anidb.net/ch41395 [Sentarou] helps her out by chance. And then, through them, she meets college student http://anidb.net/ch41398 [Jun`ichi]...
Source: Official Site
name: Fukahori Yurika
